meanings.definition: A person who works a set number of hours per week.
meanings.sent1: The timeworker at the office always leaves promptly at 5 p.m.
meanings.sent2: My dad is a timeworker, so he works from 9 to 5 every day.
meanings.sent3: The timeworker decided to take a break and go for a walk around the block.
meanings.sent4: Even though she was a timeworker, her dedication to her job was boundless.
meanings.sent5: The timeworker's routine was as predictable as the rising sun.

meanings.definition: To work a specific number of hours each day or week.
meanings.sent1: I timeworker at the factory for eight hours every day.
meanings.sent2: She timeworkers diligently to ensure she finishes her tasks on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to timeworker by napping for exactly 3 hours.
meanings.sent4: He timeworked through the night to complete the project before the deadline.
meanings.sent5: The students timeworked on their assignments with focused determination.
